resources.string: Quiz App

Cheat!
Cheaters never win
Did Ash Ketchum, the main character, ever have a shiny Pokemon?
Ash Ketchum has a pokemon called Noctowl that was green.
Does Pikachu have black at the end of his tail.
Mandela Effect and Pikachu has black tipped ears.
Ash never gives Pikachu a thunderstone to evolve.
Pikachu loses a battle against a Gym Leaders Raichu.
Pikachu loses a battle because of string shot.
In the Alola region Pikachu faces a bug pokemon in an unsuccessful attempted capture.
Ash has a rival named Jerry.
He has a four letter name.
What starter pokemon did Ash rescue from the rain
It was a fire type only pokemon.
Which move does Pikachu not have?
Pikachu is an electric type pokemon.
True
False
